title: math
content:
Hello seniors please help 
Can someone please share the name of the most common textbooks used for math in first year thanks!

comments.body:
The books recommended by the college are:

Advanced engineering mathematics by RK Jain and SRK Iyengar- 5th edition, 2016

That will be the primary text book and some exam problems will be taken from that book.

Other reference books are:

Higher Engineering Mathematics- B.V Ramana- 2017

And 

Higher Engineering Mathematics by B.S Grewal 44th edition,2021

And 

Advanced engineering mathematics by Erwin Kreyszig- 10th edition - 2015
For 1st year the best advice is.....do PESU Academy Slides, Notes, Question Bank, and Assignment Questions. You will top the class im not even joking
